p: The mean infiltration ratios of snowmelt water to soil at the D max of 0.10, 0.20, 0.30, 0.40, and 0.50 m were 0.95, 0.80, 0.48, 0.16, and 0.04, respectively, indicating a remarkable decline between 0.20 and 0.40 m of D max ( Fig. 2b). The D max causing half of the infiltration ratio was around 0.29 to 0.30 m.
